name: get-upload-policy
description: This Lambda function will generate and return a policy to allow users to upload files to S3

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name get-upload-policy --handler index.handler --memory-size 128 --runtime nodejs8.10 --role arn:aws:iam::536772866969:role/lambda-s3-execution-role --timeout 3 --publish --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip --profile study-lambda
scripts.deploy: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name get-upload-policy --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip --profile study-lambda

author: Peter Sbarski
